About

We strive to be the best company of our kind. Our engineering resources and financial stability are essential to providing the technology and the new products you require to be competitive.

Our high-quality services are recognized by our clients, also includes Fortune 500 companies. As an international-oriented advisory company as well as local based experience, we are familiar with foreign investment enterprises’ requirements and local laws and regulation.

Chairman's Message

Our core purpose is to help you reduce your assembly costs either through technology, improved assembly processes or lower component costs.

While we are a manufacturing company, our true value is that of a value-added engineering company. Since 1948, we have been dedicated to providing the best engineered components and assembly solutions for tens of thousands of applications. We do this by providing technical assistance through application design, manufacturing the most cost effective components and when required, building precision equipment to assemble your products. In the end, we are accountable for the total assembly solution and your complete satisfaction.

Our mission is to set the industry standard for product quality, service and value by exceeding your expectations through continuous improvement. You will be able to rely on SPIROL as a partner that produces true value and is able to support your demanding needs for decades to come.

Jeffrey F. Koehl
Chairman / Chief Executive Officer
